testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Fatema collaborating on many projects at Verizon connect, Fatema has the energy, the passion and the ability to adopt new technologies, She has always been willing to take on new responsibilities and made our weekly meetings enjoyable. I highly recommend her.

We were working with Fatema in Verizon Connect. Also she was a great part of Coderdojo and WAVE team, she is always ready to help. Fatema is a great team member, she builds strong relationships with others, provides continuous coaching and displays a harmonious and cooperative spirit. Fatema displays an ability to learn rapidly and adapt quickly to changing situations and continues to grow and improve. I recommend Fatema to any development team as a great person to work with!
